newsitem.title: USA: PMT completes Retail Payment deal.
newsitem.headline: PMT completes Retail Payment deal.

text.p: PMT Services Inc said Wednesday it has completed a deal to acquire New York-based Retail Payment System Inc of New York.
In a statement, PMT said the New York firm has a merchant portfolio of approximately 2,000 accounts, with an annual charge volume of approximately $400 million.
The acquisition is being accounted for as a pooling of interests, said Richardson Roberts, PMT's chairman and chief executive officer.

PMT is an independent service organization which markets and services electronic credit card authorization and payment systems to small retail and professional businesses throughout the United States.
